name: Figma Catan (Playable)
description:
This is a fully playable version of Stephen Barkan's Figma Catan. This version is playable over Figma with no additional materials. Roll dice, look at your secret hand, and trade resources all within the Figma File! Uses a card set from Blaise Vincz (linked in the file). See instructions inside.

V2: Now skip all the setup by randomizing the board with a plugin as well!

V3: Fixes city build cost, flips resources over by default.
